mapper.select: SELECT PL.PARKING_LIST_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NAME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPERATE_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PARKING_SIZE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPEN_DAYS ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PRICE_INFO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NTIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NPRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_ATIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_APRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PAY_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS ,PL.MEMBER_NO ,PL.PARKING_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_REASON ,PL.MODIFY_DATE, P.ALLIANCE_DATE ,P.PARKING_TYPE ,P.ADDRESS ,P.ROAD_ADDRESS ,P.REMARKS ,P.PARKING_MANGEMENT ,M.MEMBER_ID ,M.PHONE FROM PARKING_LIST PL INNER JOIN PARKING P ON(P.PARKING_NO=PL.PARKING_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO=PL.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY PARKING_LIST_NO DESC

SELECT PL.PARKING_LIST_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NAME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPERATE_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PARKING_SIZE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPEN_DAYS ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PRICE_INFO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NTIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NPRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_ATIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_APRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PAY_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS ,PL.MEMBER_NO ,PL.PARKING_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_REASON ,PL.MODIFY_DATE, P.ALLIANCE_DATE ,P.PARKING_TYPE ,P.ADDRESS ,P.ROAD_ADDRESS ,P.REMARKS ,P.PARKING_MANGEMENT ,M.MEMBER_ID ,M.PHONE FROM PARKING_LIST PL INNER JOIN PARKING P ON(P.PARKING_NO=PL.PARKING_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO=PL.MEMBER_NO) WHERE PL.PARKING_LIST_NO = #{parkingListNo}

SELECT PL.PARKING_LIST_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NAME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPERATE_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PARKING_SIZE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPEN_DAYS ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PRICE_INFO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NTIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NPRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_ATIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_APRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PAY_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS ,PL.MEMBER_NO ,PL.PARKING_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_REASON ,PL.MODIFY_DATE, P.ALLIANCE_DATE ,P.PARKING_TYPE ,P.ADDRESS ,P.ROAD_ADDRESS ,P.REMARKS ,P.PARKING_MANGEMENT ,M.MEMBER_ID ,M.PHONE FROM PARKING_LIST PL INNER JOIN PARKING P ON(P.PARKING_NO=PL.PARKING_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO=PL.MEMBER_NO) WHERE PARKING_LIST_NO = #{parkingListNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_LIST PL INNER JOIN PARKING P ON(P.PARKING_NO=PL.PARKING_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO=PL.MEMBER_NO) WHERE 0=0
AND (PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경중' OR PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경완료' OR PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '반송')
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경중'
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경완료'
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '반송'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND P.ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{parkingAddress}||'%'
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_NAME LIKE '%'||#{parkingListName}||'%'
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT PL.PARKING_LIST_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NAME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPERATE_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PARKING_SIZE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_OPEN_DAYS ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_WEEKDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_SAT_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_STIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_HOLIDAY_ETIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PRICE_INFO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NTIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_NPRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_ATIME ,PL.PARKING_LIST_APRICE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_PAY_TYPE ,PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS ,PL.MEMBER_NO ,PL.PARKING_NO ,PL.PARKING_LIST_REASON ,PL.MODIFY_DATE, P.ALLIANCE_DATE ,P.PARKING_TYPE ,P.ADDRESS ,P.ROAD_ADDRESS ,P.REMARKS ,P.PARKING_MANGEMENT ,M.MEMBER_ID ,M.PHONE FROM PARKING_LIST PL INNER JOIN PARKING P ON(P.PARKING_NO=PL.PARKING_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO=PL.MEMBER_NO) WHERE 0=0
AND (PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경중' OR PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경완료' OR PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '반송')
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경중'
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '변경완료'
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_STATUS = '반송'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND P.ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{parkingAddress}||'%'
AND PL.PARKING_LIST_NAME LIKE '%'||#{parkingListName}||'%'
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))
ORDER BY PARKING_LIST_NO DESC
